products.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Origin, Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent. Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets.

products.title: Origin, Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Origin, Dark Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: In dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brackets, and a sleek and impactful design, this blind is the height of luxury. Use the dark brown as part of a neutral colour scheme, surrounding it with white, cream, or ivory walls and furniture and accessories in cocoas, mochas, and taupes.

products.title: Origin, Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

products.title: Origin, Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

products.title: Origin, Black - Day Night Blind
products.description: In sleek ebony, the origin in black is flawlessly chic. The blind comprises of a smooth, contemporary double layering of jet black fabric, which hosts a sliding strip of black striped netting, and an overhead rail cassette containing the controls and brackets. Fuse the black with a sunny yellow for a cool and fashionable look in a teenager's bedroom. Stick to a base of pure white walls, and use a mixture of black and lemon for the bedlinen, wall hangings, and ornaments.

products.title: Origin, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: The origin brown consists of a milky coffee-toned fabric, smooth with just the faintest of textures, and similarly shaded threading through a translucent netting. Brackets and controls are hidden neatly away in the overhead rail cassette, yet are easily accessible as needed. Team the brown with a rich burnt orange for a cosy, autumnal colour scheme in a dining room or living room. Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Pure
products.description: The day & night woven pure roller blind features a light white colour that's both versatile and practical. The premium texture also helps to make this blind a stylish choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a charming addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Origin, Chocolate Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: This time in milky chocolate brown, the origin range provides stylish functionality, with its streamlined rail cassette, hidden controls, and sleek, sliding strips. The fabric itself is neatly woven, offering just the gentlest of texturing. Mix the chocolate brown with sage green tones for an outdoors-in look and feel in your home office. Treat yourself to a heavy oak desk and include warming fabrics in these two contrasting shades.

products.title: Day & Night Stacked Parchment
products.description: In its gorgeous silver colour, the day & night stacked parchment roller blind is ideal for creating a modern theme, with silver and grey being an ever-popular interior design choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? products.title: Day & Night Pincheck Dark Arts
products.description: The day & night pincheck dark arts roller blind is both stylish and practical, as well as being dark and mysterious. One of the most versatile colours in interior design, black matches all colours for a blind that can endure multiple restyles. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Pincheck Mocha
products.description: Much like the name suggests, the day & night pincheck mocha will bring some rich coffee tones to your home. This blind is both stylish and practical, and is perfect for creating a natural, earthy interior. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, whats not to like? Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Magnum, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: A golden-hued woody shade, and with sliding translucent strips between the double-layered fabric, the magnum in brown is both attractive and functional. The overhead rail cassette hides the controls from view, making for a clean and streamlined effect. Add the brown to a forest green colour scheme, allowing the wood-look hue to complement the outdoorsy green. Include plenty of natural woods in the room and accent throughout with organic, forest and sage greens, deep browns, and understated golds for a coordinated and coherent look.

products.title: Magnum, Taupe - Day Night Blind
products.description: A gorgeous fusion of chocolate and cream threads, the magnum in taupe looks both natural and stylish. Of course, it's also amazingly practical, with versatile privacy and light control that can be easily adjusted to your will. Use the taupe in an all-white living room, where light and airiness are your top priorities. Fill the room with natural, naked woods, both light and medium, and organic fabrics such as hessian and wicker, finishing the room off with a woven jute rug.

products.title: Luna Softshade Cream Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make the most of natural light in your home without compromising on privacy with the luna softshade cream day and night roller blind. This design of alternating beige fabric and voile strips looks clean and modern for accessorising any setting whilst the innovative opening and closing function allows light to penetrate at the same time as giving you a sense of peace and seclusion. Product id: db-vrbx1860 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes luna softshade cream day and night blind in cream.

products.title: Luna Softshade Slate Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: This blind has a unique look that is sleek and stylish as well as highly practical for a modern living space. The luna softshade slate grey day and night roller blind can be easily adjusted to suit any time of day, the weather and your mood. It can be completely closed or open, or adjusted to the semi closed position with strips of voile between the solid slate grey fabric panels. This mode allows for an element of privacy with the benefit of natural light.

products.title: Luna Softshade Natural Day And Night Blind
products.description: The luna softshade natural day and night roller blind will bring a sense of peace and calm thanks to the warm and neutral colourway and its innovative adjustable design. This blind is a great way to cover your windows for a bit of privacy whilst keeping your interior feeling light and bright. Made using strips of polyester and voile fabric, this versatile blind is ideal for downstairs rooms. Product id: db-vrbx1863 fabric colour: natural material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes luna softshade natural day and night blind in cream.

products.title: Luna Softshade Jet Black Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make an update that will benefit the look and feel of your interior with this practical day and night roller blind. The luna softshade jet black day and night roller blind is designed with flexibility in mind. It can be fully opened or closed just like a standard day and night roller blind as well as adjusted to a semi closed position that enables both natural light penetration and privacy.
